name: part_005
file: tmp_【3D LIVE】3D新衣装お披露目!! 兎田ぺこら生誕祭ライブ♪【ホロライブ⧸兎田ぺこら】 [jgoJuJiWtf4]_gemini-3-flash-preview/reencoded/part_005.mov

scenes.description: Shirakami Fubuki, Yukihana Lamy, Usada Pekora, Nakiri Ayame, and Shirogane Noel perform 'Suki!' (すきっ！).
Usada Pekora, Oozora Subaru, Tokoyami Towa, and Momosuzu Nene perform 'Salaba, Itoshiki Kanashimi-tachi yo' (サラバ、愛しき悲しみたちよ).

subtitles.original: 身体に電気が走った
subtitles.english: An electric shock ran through my body

subtitles.original: ぜったい ぜったい ぜったい これは運命だ
subtitles.english: Definitely, definitely, definitely, this is destiny

subtitles.original: ねぇ ほら
subtitles.english: Hey, look

subtitles.original: ドキドキしてやばいの

subtitles.original: 世界中で君だけだよ 叫んじゃいたいぜ

subtitles.english: I thought about that, but

subtitles.english: I'm about to burst, it's no use, I can't hold it back

subtitles.english: I hope we'll be together someday

subtitles.original: あーーー!
subtitles.english: Ahhh!
